DefaultEvent.Description: Your crew searches the ship, complicit together in this act of banditry, unhappy, but obedient for now. Here's what they've found -
DefaultEvent.Name: What's this?

RareDefaultEvent.Description: One of your sailors breaks down. She didn't go to sea to be a pirate! You've betrayed the fellowship of the sea! Your bo'sun is forced to shoot her when she leaps at you. Grim eyes, tightened lips. But here's your hard-won treasure.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A regrettable incident

ChildBranches.Name: Loot and scuttle her
ChildBranches.Description: Take what you can. Hide the evidence of your crime.

Description: Innocent men and women are dead, but that's their problem. And yours, if you're caught, but let's not dwell on that. What now?
Name: You've destroyed a Merchant Cruiser
